Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.xoxinternals.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
eu.kartoffelquadrat.xoxinternals.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardReadOnly
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardReadOnly
Xox specific implementation of the board interface. Encodes 3x3 matrix with individually maintained state model per cell.

    Board()
    Default constructor for Xox boards.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Default constructor for Xox boards. Creates an empty 3x3 cell matrix.

  • Method Details

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Iterates of a board and returns true if all cells are populated.
      Specified by:
      isFull in interface BoardReadOnly
      Returns:
      boolean telling whether the xox is full.

    • isThreeInALine

      public boolean isThreeInALine()
      Insepcts the cells and returns true if three equal symbols lie on row, column or main diagonal.
      Returns:
      boolean telling whether on the current board there are three cells in a line, claimed by the same player.

    • getThreeInALineCharIfExists

      public char getThreeInALineCharIfExists()
      If there a three in a line, this method returns the character of those cells. If there are not, it returns the space character.
      Returns:
      a character indicating the occupier of the line or a whitespace.
